about_us.title: About Us
about_us.description: A Saudi company working in the field of technology and information through using of AI (artificial intelligence) technologies, computer vision, the use of robots, the provision of AR (augmented reality) experience, data science, the acquisition of outputs through certain procedures that created according to the workflow, the installation of networking and communications services, camera monitoring systems and the provision of Cyber security services.

our_services.title: Our Services
our_services.description: The Vision Things Company offers many technical and informational services, networks and other services that you can view and learn more about

cards.title: Development and Research
cards.description: The company works to provide the latest technical solutions through R&D in the following fields AI, CR, Robots and IOT

cards.title: Network Solutions
cards.description: Network extension design is the process of planning and implementing a new or updated network system. This includes identifying business needs

cards.title: Business Solutions
cards.description: Creating websites and technical solutions to facilitate business management operations and make them administratively more professional

home_camera_contract.title: Camera Maintenance Contract
home_camera_contract.description: The Vision of Things company connects and extends the security camera networks, and also enables you to contract electronically for installation and extension, and to book an appointment for a quick inspection.

why_choose_us.title: Why choose Vision Things
why_choose_us.description: Why choose Vision Things to supply, install and operate technical equipment in the fields of IT and information in general?

cards.title: Supplying New Technical Equipment
cards.description: A vision of things company provides completely new and always better technical solutions

cards.title: Providing Technical Support
cards.description: We also provide technical support, assistance and visits to solve problems

cards.description: Vision of Things always offers the best prices compared to the local and international market

cards.title: The Company's Experience In The Field of Technical
cards.description: The company has sufficient experience in the fields of IT by our engineers

cards.title: Providing The Appropriate Technical Solutions

vision_and_mission.title: Vision and mission
vision_and_mission.description: Providing a vision for the future of technology in the Saudi Arabia. Providing the latest science technology solutions for help our customers in their business and supporting the Kingdom's economy by providing the latest technology and solutions.

form.title: Contact Us

visit_request.title: Visit Request
visit_request.description: If you need a visit from our technicians, you can send a visit request just one click away and we will call you back within 24 hours to schedule an appointment for just 750.00 SAR.
